attributes.action: Improve the E-petitions to enable signing against a petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reading the list of petitions there are quite a few which I and no doubt many other people would wholeheartedly disagree with. Why can't I sign to say "I disagree"?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
